summary_points: 1. Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. completed its acquisition of AssuredPartners on August 18, 2025, for a total cash purchase price of $13.8 billion.
2. The acquisition is expected to result in double-digit adjusted EPS accretion for Arthur J. Gallagher & Co., including the impact of synergies.
3. Gallagher granted $316.15 million in equity awards to 572 former AssuredPartners employees to aid in their retention following the acquisition.
1. Trimble Inc. announced the retirement of its Chief Accounting Officer, Julie Shepard, effective early 2026, and appointed Kenneth Bement as her successor, starting September 2, 2025.
2. Mr. Bement will receive a $400,000 annual base salary, a potential $200,000 one-time bonus, and $2,000,000 in restricted stock units vesting over three years.
3.  A new Chief Information Officer position has been created to support the company's "Connect and Scale" digital transformation strategy.
